en.name: MSS-Discord Help
en.description: Probably the only command that is in all bots.
en.paragraph1:
For a list of commands, please run `@MSS man`
For help on a specific command, please run `@MSS man <command>`
en.paragraph3: This software is released under the MIT Licence.

pi.name: Ye need alliances
pi.description: Yer list of pirates to go with
pi.paragraph1:
For a map to depart to sea, run ye `@MSS man` command
For assistance at the wheel, run `@MSS man <command>`
pi.paragraph3: I be a licenced MIT sailor.
